short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adding a pending task to publish an Instagram post.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Google extension allows you to quickly add a task to publish an Instagram post. Simply enter the post details, and it will be added to the pending tasks list, ensuring you don't forget to post it. Only for @it.syndicate account!!!
